items.summary: Add an `ic-domains` allowlist file to the frontend assets so the deployed frontend canister explicitly serves both the apex and www hostnames: `myrepubicnetwork.web.id` and `www.myrepubicnetwork.web.id`. The file must be included in the built static assets so it is available from the frontend canister at runtime.

Update repository documentation to include the exact post-deploy steps required to activate the apex/root custom domain on the ICP gateway, including a separate POST registration for `myrepubicnetwork.web.id` (in addition to any existing `www` registration), and explicitly call out that a redeploy is required after updating `ic-domains`.
